original_title: Nihon de Ichiban Kowai Hanashi Edo Kaidan
overview: This DVD contains the first "horror period drama" recorded at Nikko Edo village, in pursuit of authentic terror.  Episode 1: A Broken Promise  Episode 2: Ubume  Episode 3: Tales of the Peony Lantern
title: Nihon de Ichiban Kowai Hanashi Edo Kaidan
